title: Danilo (footballer, born July 1991) - Wikipedia
snippet: Danilo Luiz da Silva (born 15 July 1991), known as Danilo (Brazilian Portuguese: [dɐ̃ˈnilʊ]), is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back or right-back for Campeonato Brasileiro Série A club Flamengo and the Brazil national team.

title: Danilo leaves Rangers to join NEC Nijmegen on loan
snippet: 1 day ago · Rangers have confirmed Brazilian striker Danilo has left to join NEC Nijmegen on loan for the rest of the season. The deal includes an option for NEC, who are currently third in the Eredivisie, to ...

title: Danilo exit latest emerges from overseas after midnight ...
snippet: 1 day ago · The Scottish transfer deadline has passed without Danilo leaving Rangers, but he's still set to leave Glasgow this winter.

title: Danilo completes Rangers exit with loan to NEC Nijmegen
snippet: 1 day ago · Danilo has completed his exit from Rangers, joining NEC Nijmegen on loan. The forward, 26, has joined the Eredivisie side on a temporary deal until the end of the season, returning to the Netherlands.
